text: Pogonocherus inermicollis is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Edmund Reitter in 1894. It is known from the Caucasus Mountains.BioLib.cz - Pogonocherus inermicollis. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Pogonocherini Category:Beetles described in 1894
title: Pogonocherus inermicollis
